New Records: Aaron Civale allowed just 2 hits in 7 innings, the Brewers' lowest ERA in a month (4.59).
William Contreras stole home in the 4th inning, contributing to the Brewers' win.
Key Match Events: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout, leading the Brewers to a 6-0 victory.
William Contreras stole home, a key moment in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Civale and the Brewers' bullpen performed exceptionally well, shutting out the Giants.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at American Family Field with 30,920 attendees.
